name: King's Fall Into Madness
description:
ZOOM the page to at least 400% 

King has lost his mind and is stuck in never ending purgatory. Every time you die another music track starts overlapping enforcing more madness.

Controls are reversed, up is down, down is up, right is left, left is right.

For how long can you help the Mad King survive his own delusions?

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Underclocked - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
